atlanta.neighborhoods: Midtown, Downtown, Buckhead, Inman Park, Virginia-Highland, East Atlanta
atlanta.meetingHighlights: Extensive AA community across neighborhoods with many specialty meetings (Spanish-language, LGBTQ+, young people) and frequent large speaker events.
atlanta.transitInfo: MARTA rail and bus network serve the city; Hartsfieldâ€“Jackson Atlanta International Airport (ATL) is a major international hub.

augusta.neighborhoods: Downtown, Olde Town, Summerville, North Augusta (nearby), West Augusta, Turpin Hill
augusta.meetingHighlights: Active downtown and Summerville meetings with an engaged fellowship and regular speaker nights and workshops.
augusta.transitInfo: Augusta Public Transit provides local service; Augusta Regional Airport (AGS) offers regional connections.

columbus.meetingHighlights: Community-centered meetings with strong military and university outreach (near Fort Benning), regular evening and weekend options.
columbus.transitInfo: METRA Transit buses cover the metro; Columbus Metropolitan Airport provides regional flights.

macon.neighborhoods: Downtown, Vineville, Shirley Hills, Ingleside, North Macon, Lizella
macon.meetingHighlights: Historic meetings with strong Big Book study groups; active fellowship around Mercer University and downtown area.
macon.transitInfo: Macon Transit Authority provides bus service; Middle Georgia Regional Airport (MCN) offers regional flights.

savannah.neighborhoods: Historic District, Victorian District, Starland, Midtown
savannah.meetingHighlights: Historic downtown meetings with a strong seasonal influx of visitors; active community and church-based groups in Starland and Midtown.
savannah.transitInfo: Chatham Area Transit provides bus services; Savannah/Hilton Head International Airport (SAV) for regional travel.

athens.areaDescription: Athens area, home to University of Georgia
athens.neighborhoods: Downtown, Five Points, Normaltown, Cobbham, Boulevard, Eastside
athens.meetingHighlights: College-town meetings with young people's groups and active campus outreach at UGA; vibrant music scene recovery community.
athens.transitInfo: Athens Transit provides bus routes throughout the city and UGA campus; Groome Transportation connects to Atlanta airport.
